Uses of Interface
btrplace.solver.choco.transition.Transition

  • Packages that use Transition 
    Package Description
    btrplace.solver.choco.transition
    Different classes to model the possible state transitions for a VM or a node.

    • Uses of Transition in btrplace.solver.choco.transition

      Subinterfaces of Transition in btrplace.solver.choco.transition 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  KeepRunningVM
      An interface to specify an VM transition on a VM that is running and that will keep running.
      interface  NodeTransition
      Interface to specify a transition that manipulates a node.
      interface  VMTransition
      Interface to specify a transition over a VM.
      Classes in btrplace.solver.choco.transition that implement Transition 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BootableNode
      Model a transition that allows an offline node to be booted if necessary.
      class  BootVM
      Model a transition that allows a ready VP to be booted on a node.
      class  ForgeVM
      Model a transition that will forge a VM to put it into the ready state.
      class  KillVM
      An action to model a VM that is killed.
      class  RelocatableVM
      Model an action that allow a running VM to be relocate elsewhere if necessary.
      class  ResumeVM
      Model an action that resume a sleeping VM.
      class  ShutdownableNode
      Model an action that allow a node to boot if necessary.
      class  ShutdownVM
      Model an action that stop a running VM.
      class  StayAwayVM
      A fake action model that indicates the VM is ready or sleeping and does not go in the running state.
      class  SuspendVM
      Model an action where a running VM goes into the sleeping state through a SuspendVM action.
      Methods in btrplace.solver.choco.transition with parameters of type Transition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static solver.variables.IntVar[] TransitionUtils.getDurations(Transition[] actions)
      Extract the durations of an array of actions.
      static solver.variables.IntVar[] TransitionUtils.getEnds(Transition[] actions)
      Extract the end moments of an array of actions.
      static solver.variables.IntVar[] TransitionUtils.getStarts(Transition[] actions)
      Extract the consume moments of an array of actions.
